{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/history":{"caption":"History","created":"20140910032641035","creator":"EucalyJ","lastupdate":"20140918","modified":"20140921111023904","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_readme $:/_quickjump","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/history","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!!!History * 20140918 / ''0.0.3'' -- icons * 20140913 / ''0.0.2'' ( 4.4K / 1.9K ) -- for 5.0.17-beta ~ ** stylesheet tagged with {{$:/tags/Stylesheet||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} ** Change ButtonWidget `title` attribute to `tooltip` * 20140909 / ''0.0.1'' ( 3.8K / 1.5K ) -- first version "},"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/icon":{"created":"20140918103216925","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140921111324109","modifier":"EucalyJ","ref":"qqj-4a.svg","tags":"$:/tags/Image $:/_quickjump","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/icon","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" "},"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/macros":{"created":"20140909113810419","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140921111343875","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_macros $:/_quickjump $:/tags/Macro","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/macros","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/language/CloseAll/ \define QuickJump() <$button popup=<> tooltip="Jump to Tiddlers" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/icon"> @@color:#888;â–³@@ <$reveal type="popup" state=<> position="belowleft">

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/temp/qjmp" field="catcher" checked="" unchecked=<> default=""> Keep on top / [[[?] QuickJump|$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/readme]]

<$linkcatcher message="tm-navigate" set={{$:/temp/qjmp!!catcher}} setTo=""> <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]]"> <$button message="tm-close-tiddler" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini">× <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> <$button message="tm-close-all-tiddlers" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini" set=<> setTo=""><> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/info/node" text="yes"> ^^<$link to="" tooltip=<> >story <$link to="" tooltip=<">> >trans <$link to="" tooltip=<> >listItem^^
\end"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/readme":{"caption":"~QuickJump","created":"20140905132557737","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20141004023452682","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_readme $:/_quickjump","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!![[QuickJump Plugin|$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/readme]]
QuickJump - Quick jump to tiddlers in story list !!!Features # Add " <> " button to bring a popup menu to ''jump to tiddlers in story list'' -- emulate the function of ` Open tab ` ( [[$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open]] @sidebar ) # After jumping #* Keep popup menu on top, or #* Auto close the popup # Technical #* Practice `<$linkcatcher>` widget !!!Install * Drag&Drop -- [[$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump]] (with documentation) !!!Uasge # Create a new tiddler that contains `<>` macro call # Add {{$:/tags/TopRightBar||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} tag to the tiddler # If necessary, tweak [[$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/StyleSheet]] # Possible for other locations, such as {{$:/tags/TopLeftBar||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} {{$:/tags/PageControls||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} {{$:/tags/ViewToolbar||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} or [[$:/SiteSubtitle]]. While, might need to tweak: #* ~StyleSheet as mentioned above #* [[Popup position|http://tiddlywiki.com/#RevealWidget]] (other than ''belowleft'') in [[$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/macros]]"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/StyleSheet":{"created":"20140909114640581","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140912233946258","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_macros $:/_quickjump $:/tags/Stylesheet","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/StyleSheet","type":"text/css","text":".tc-qjmp-popup p { white-space: pre; } .tc-qjmp-popup { font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; } .tc-qjmp-popup .tc-btn-invisible { padding: 0px; }"}}}
author: EucalyJ
creator: EucalyJ
description: QuickJump - Quick jump to tiddlers in story list
title: $:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump
name: quickjump
